languages.text: "Сотрудничество — обоюдоострый клинок. Где используешь ты, там легко используют и тебя. Что и произошло с Вольным Торговцем — Леди Теодора {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}использовала {mf|его|ее}{/d}, чтобы чужими руками подорвать власть Империума в Просторе".

traits.locale_text: "Сотрудничество — обоюдоострый клинок. Где используешь ты, там легко используют и тебя. Что и произошло с Вольным Торговцем — Леди Теодора использовала {mf|его|ее}, чтобы чужими руками подорвать власть Империума в Коронусе".

languages.text: "Cooperation is a double-edged sword. Sometimes you use your partner and sometimes your partner uses you. Which is what happened to the Rogue Trader. Lady Theodora {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}used {mf|him|her}{/d} to undermine the standing of the Imperium in the Expanse."
languages.original_text: "Сотрудничество — обоюдоострый клинок. Где используешь ты, там легко используют и тебя. Что и произошло с Вольным Торговцем — Леди Теодора {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}использовала {mf|его|ее}{/d}, чтобы чужими руками подорвать власть Империума в Просторе".

traits.locale_text: "Cooperation is a double-edged sword. Sometimes you use your partner and sometimes the partner uses you. Which is what happened to the Rogue Trader, Lady Theodora used {mf|him|her} to undermine the positions of the Imperium in the Expanse."

"Cooperation is a double-edged sword. Sometimes you use your partner and sometimes the partner uses you. Which is what happened to the Rogue Trader, Lady Theodora used {mf|him|her} to undermine the positions of the Imperium in the Expanse."

"Cooperation is a double-edged sword. Sometimes you use your partner and sometimes your partner uses you. Which is what happened to the Rogue Trader. Lady Theodora {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}used {mf|him|her}{/d} to undermine the standing of the Imperium in the Expanse."

languages.text: « La coopération est une arme à double tranchant. Parfois, vous utilisez votre partenaire, mais parfois, c'est lui qui vous utilise. Et c'est ce qui est arrivé {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. Dame Théodora s'est {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}servie {mf|de lui|d'elle}{/d} pour saper la position de l'Imperium dans les Étendues. »
languages.original_text: "Cooperation is a double-edged sword. Sometimes you use your partner and sometimes your partner uses you. Which is what happened to the Rogue Trader. Lady Theodora {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}used {mf|him|her}{/d} to undermine the standing of the Imperium in the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: « La coopération est une arme à double tranchant. Parfois, vous utilisez votre partenaire, mais parfois, c'est lui qui vous utilise. Et c'est ce qui est arrivé {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. Dame Théodora s'est servie {mf|de lui|d'elle} pour saper la position de l'Imperium dans les Étendues. »

languages.text: “合作是一把双刃剑。有的时候你利用你的伙伴，有的时候你的伙伴会利用你，而这就是行商浪人遭遇的事情。西奥多拉夫人{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}利用了{mf|他|她}{/d}，动摇帝国在科罗努斯扩区中的统治。”
languages.original_text: "Cooperation is a double-edged sword. Sometimes you use your partner and sometimes your partner uses you. Which is what happened to the Rogue Trader. Lady Theodora {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}used {mf|him|her}{/d} to undermine the standing of the Imperium in the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: “合作是一把双刃剑。有的时候你利用你的伙伴，有的时候你的伙伴会利用你，而这就是行商浪人遭遇的事情。西奥多拉夫人利用{mf|他|她}，动摇帝国在科罗努斯扩区中的统治。”

languages.text: 「協力とは諸刃の剣なのだ。自分が相手を利用することもあれば、相手に利用されることもある。自由開拓者の件が正にそうだった。シオドーラ卿は{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}{mf|彼|彼女}を利用し{/d}、エクスパンスにおける帝国の地位を貶めた」
languages.original_text: "Cooperation is a double-edged sword. Sometimes you use your partner and sometimes your partner uses you. Which is what happened to the Rogue Trader. Lady Theodora {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}used {mf|him|her}{/d} to undermine the standing of the Imperium in the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: 「協力とは諸刃の剣なのだ。自分が相手を利用することもあれば、相手に利用されることもある。自由開拓者の件が正にそうだった。シオドーラ卿は{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}{mf|彼|彼女}を利用し{/d}、エクスパンスにおける帝国の地位を貶めた」

languages.text: "Kooperation ist ein zweischneidiges Schwert. Manchmal benutzt man seinen Partner und manchmal wird man von seinem Partner benutzt. Genau das ist {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} widerfahren. Lady Theodora {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}benutze {mf|ihn|sie}{/d}, um das Ansehen des Imperiums in der Ausdehnung zu unterminieren."
languages.original_text: "Cooperation is a double-edged sword. Sometimes you use your partner and sometimes your partner uses you. Which is what happened to the Rogue Trader. Lady Theodora {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}used {mf|him|her}{/d} to undermine the standing of the Imperium in the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Kooperation ist ein zweischneidiges Schwert. Manchmal benutzt man seinen Partner und manchmal wird man von seinem Partner benutzt. Genau das ist {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} widerfahren. Lady Theodora benutze {mf|ihn|sie}, um das Ansehen des Imperiums in der Ausdehnung zu unterminieren."

"Kooperation ist ein zweischneidiges Schwert. Manchmal benutzt man seinen Partner und manchmal wird man von seinem Partner benutzt. Genau das ist {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} widerfahren. Lady Theodora benutze {mf|ihn|sie}, um das Ansehen des Imperiums in der Ausdehnung zu unterminieren."

languages.text: «La cooperación es un arma de doble filo. A veces se usa al socio, y otras veces es el socio quien le usa a uno. Que es lo que le pasó {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente. Lady Theodora {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}{mf|lo|la} utilizó{/d} para mermar la influencia del Imperium en la Extensión».
languages.original_text: "Cooperation is a double-edged sword. Sometimes you use your partner and sometimes your partner uses you. Which is what happened to the Rogue Trader. Lady Theodora {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}used {mf|him|her}{/d} to undermine the standing of the Imperium in the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: «La cooperación es un arma de doble filo. A veces se usa al socio, y otras veces es el socio quien le usa a uno. Que es lo que le pasó {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente. Lady Theodora {mf|lo|la} utilizó para mermar la influencia del Imperium en la Extensión».

languages.text: "İş birliği, iki ucu keskin bir kılıçtır. Bazen sen ortağını kullanırsın, bazense ortağın seni kullanır. Hür Tacir'in başına gelen de tam olarak bu. Leydi Theodora, İmparatorluk'un Enginlik'teki gücünü azaltmak için {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}onu kullanmıştır{/d}."
languages.original_text: "Cooperation is a double-edged sword. Sometimes you use your partner and sometimes your partner uses you. Which is what happened to the Rogue Trader. Lady Theodora {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_TheodoraAlive}used {mf|him|her}{/d} to undermine the standing of the Imperium in the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "İş birliği, iki ucu keskin bir kılıçtır. Bazen sen partnerini kullanırsın, bazense partnerin seni kullanır. Hür Tacir'in başına gelen de tam olarak bu. Leydi Tehodora, İmparatorluk'un Enginlik'teki gücünü azaltmak için onu kullanmıştır."
